claim:
Environment:
Hot outside, much sunshine
Can feel the sunlight
The environment is bright and relaxed without burden
Outdoors environment is better than the indoors
Sunny and warm
Can feel stronger Qi in outdoor environment
Feel stronger Qi in outdoor environment
It's windy and a little bit cold in outdoor environment
Indoor classroom is where we usually practice and feel a sense of safety


The research time we chose was late fall in the indoor environment (Fig 1) and in the outdoor environment (Fig 2) about 25.7°C and 20.8°C; outdoor environment (Fig 3) is about 23.8°C and 26.1°C; in late spring outdoor environment (Fig 2) is about 30.8°C and 33.3°C; outdoor environment (Fig 3) is about 29.4°C and 25.1°C.
title: Fig 1. The indoor location where primary students usually practice Qigong.
